TRASHBIN_DESCRIPTION: Mwonekano wa nguvu na wa kisasa wa kiendelezi asili cha Trashbin
MESSAGE_SONG_ADDED: Wimbo umeongezwa kwenye pipa la taka
MESSAGE_ARTIST_ADDED: Msanii ameongezwa kwenye pipa la taka
BACKUP_SAVE_FAILED: Imeshindwa kuhifadhi nakala rudufu, jaribu kunakili yaliyomo kwenye pipa la taka kwenye ubao wa kunakili na uunde hifadhi rudufu wewe mwenyewe.
BACKUP_RESTORE_FAILED: Imeshindwa kurejesha nakala rudufu, jaribu kuleta yaliyomo kwenye pipa la taka kutoka kwa faili wewe mwenyewe.
BACKUP_FILE_READ_FAILED: Imeshindwa kusoma faili, tafadhali hakikisha kuwa ni faili sahihi ya JSON.
SETTINGS_TRACKLIST_TRASHBIN: Washa Trashbin ya Orodha ya Kufuatilia
SETTINGS_RESHUFFLE_ON_SKIP: Ruka hadi kwenye Foleni Inayofuata Isiyotupwa & Changanua upya
ITEMS_EMPTY_SONGS:
Hakuna nyimbo zilizotupwa!
Nyimbo unazoongeza kwenye pipa zitaonekana hapa.
ITEMS_EMPTY_ARTISTS:
Hakuna wasanii waliotupwa!
Wasanii unaowaongeza kwenye pipa wataonekana hapa.
DESCRIPTION_COPY: Nakili vipengee vyote kwenye pipa kwenye ubao wa kunakili.
DESCRIPTION_EXPORT: Hifadhi vipengee vyote kwenye trashbin kwenye faili ya .json.
DESCRIPTION_IMPORT: Batilisha vipengee vyote kwenye trashbin kupitia faili ya .json.
DESCRIPTION_CLEAR: Futa vipengee vyote kutoka kwa pipa la taka (haviwezi kurejeshwa).
DESCRIPTION_SETTINGS_ENABLED: Master toggle to enable or disable all Trashbin+ functionality
DESCRIPTION_SETTINGS_SHOW_WIDGET: Display a trash icon in the playback bar next to the currently playing track for quick access
DESCRIPTION_SETTINGS_AUTOPLAY: Automatically start playing music when Spotify opens or the extension loads
DESCRIPTION_SETTINGS_QUEUE_TRASHBIN: Add trash icons next to each song in your upcoming queue for easy management
DESCRIPTION_SETTINGS_TRACKLIST_TRASHBIN: Add trash icons next to songs in album and playlist views for quick filtering
DESCRIPTION_SETTINGS_RESHUFFLE_ON_SKIP: When skipping a trashed song, automatically jump to the next non-trashed track in the queue
DESCRIPTION_SETTINGS_PLAYLIST_MONITOR: Automatically recover from Spotify playback glitches by resuming your last playlist
